overview: The Film is based on the infamous 'Charlie Murder Case' in the Indian State of Kerala where the main culprit Sukumara Kurup has been on the run for decades and is still not been caught. The story revolves around the perspective of Sukumara Kurup and the Police officers who were investigating the case.
tagline: THE STORY UNFOLDS INDIA'S LONGEST WANTED FUGITIVE
title: Kurup
